attributes.action: lift the blanket ban or ban smoking in prison
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The government has introduced a blanket ban on smoking in enclosed public places on the basis of protecting employees from passive smoke but the ban does not included prisons, aren't prison wardens and other staff classed as employees? shouldn't they be offered the same protection as employees outside the prison service?

I propose that either the governmnet includes prisons in the blanket ban

rejection.details: there are already petitions up and running on this theme
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
